SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into sys_operation_log (operation_type, operation_module, operation_content, user_id, operation_time, operation_ip, remark) values (#{operationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operationModule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operationContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operationIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sys_operation_log set operation_type = #{operationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operation_module = #{operationModule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operation_content = #{operationContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operation_time = #{operationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, operation_ip = #{operationIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, operation_type, operation_module, operation_content, user_id, operation_time, operation_ip, remark from sys_operation_log where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, operation_type, operation_module, operation_content, user_id, operation_time, operation_ip, remark from sys_operation_log
